articles.content: Cannes Film Festival 2023 is all set for its 76th edition. The prestigious film festival returns to to the French Riviera. It will be an 11 days fest starting on 16th May 2023 and will end on 27th Ma… [+318 chars]

articles.title: Sarabhai vs Sarabhai fame JD Majethia climbs Everest Base Camp at the age of 54; glimpses from his inspiring feat - Times of India
articles.description: Actor and producer of several sitcoms, JD Majethia has achieved an incredible feat by climbing Everest Base Camp. What makes it inspiring is the actor and producer ticked it off from his bucket list at the age of 54. Age is just a number and he has proven it …
articles.content: Proudly flaunting the national flag on the top of the EBC, JD Majethia completed the climb in 11 days. He has been winning accolades from several actors from the industry and also his fans and follow… [+99 chars]
